newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary '96 budget deficit was HUF 130 bln -fin min.
newsitem.headline: Hungary '96 budget deficit was HUF 130 bln -fin min.

text.p: Hungary's budget deficit in 1996 was 130 billion forints and not 179 billion forints as stated by the government spokesman last week, the Finance Ministry said on Wednesday.

The government published the 179 billion figure after approving a bill on the closing of the 1996 budget but the total did not take into account unspent public funds amounting to some 50 billion forints, finance ministry department head Ferenc Batho told a news conference.
The 1996 budget deficit of 130 billion forints equalled 3.2 percent of the gross domestic product (GDP), down from 6.7 percent in 1995, Batho said.
